description: Commit https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/171e5f8b127610d93a230a6f692d8fd5ea0d0301 converted instance dicts to objects. There are cases for the security groups where these should still be dicts. This will cause update of security groups to break.
title: Security groups may break

comments.content: Commit converted instance dicts to objects. There are cases for the security groups where these should still be dicts. This will cause update of security groups to break.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

commit 99b56a47a3654590a7fdabfb34f073911393c471
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 2 04:24:41 2015 -0700

    Compute: replace incorrect instance object with dict
    
    Commit 171e5f8b127610d93a230a6f692d8fd5ea0d0301 updated security
    groups instances to be instance objects. These are not instance objects
    and are the instances stored in the database.
    
    Change-Id: If79b5d4592e1ecbd860aa53e2d976b658c9227d0
    Closes-bug: #1461065

commit 0313351f6fb3d288a446280ac924ac5b66e0d99c
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 2 04:24:41 2015 -0700

    Compute: replace incorrect instance object with dict
    
    Commit 171e5f8b127610d93a230a6f692d8fd5ea0d0301 updated security
    groups instances to be instance objects. These are not instance objects
    and are the instances stored in the database.

    Closes-bug: #1461065
